description: An illustration of an electric potter's wheel with a vase sitting in the middle of the wheel: the tabletop of the potter's wheel is various shades of green and the legs are brown; there is a very dark green wire extending from the bottom of the table and attaches to a green, brown, and yellow foot pedal; and the wheel head is blue. The vase is various shades of brown with a wide bottom with a slightly thinner neck. There is a yellow sponge with a small puddle of water below it to the right of the wheel.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
